title.value: Characteristic of carrot varieties by   economically valuable traits
Характеристика сортов моркови столовой по хозяйственно ценным признакам

journal.title: Vegetable Growing : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Bokhan, A.I., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Institute for Vegetable Growing

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented data on the testing for economically valuable traits of carrot (Daucus carota) of the promising varieties: Paulinka, Minchanka and Litvinka. These varieties yield 51,0-62,91 /ha against 43.0-53,11 /ha in the standard (variety Lyavonikha). Their roots are highly standard. These varieties are less affected by brown leaf spot in comparison with the standard variety. The incidence of brown leaf spot on these varieties is by 1.0-1.5 points lower than on the standard. Created varieties have high taste and are suitable for industrial processing.
